env.description: Target environment to run the application in. This assumes an .env file present in the project's root in the following format: .env.{envName}

dev.description: Serve the application in the dev mode.

quiet.description: Hide error messages containing server information.

hostname.description: Hostname on which the application is served.

proxyConfig.description: Path to the proxy configuration file.

buildLibsFromSource.description: Read buildable libraries from source instead of building them separately.
